EmailTemplate.description: Freight Forwarder: When the parts are shipped via Freight Forwarder to the customer Domestic Entity
EmailTemplate.name: Export Freight Forwarder
EmailTemplate.subject: Information Needed {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Purchase Order Number: {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}
Part Number: < insert Honeywell Part Number>
We have determined that above part number is on export block and will be shipped domestically to your Entity at <insert location>.
Please confirm if you are the exporter of record for this shipment to the End User at <insert address>.
If you are not the exporter of record, please provide the End User statement and update the Export Questionnaire to apply for a license at the Department of Commerce.
Please note: the receipt of the license can take up to 10 weeks after submission to the United States government.
If you have questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
